org.gridlab.gat.advert
Interface AdvertService

All Superinterfaces:
Monitorable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdvertServiceCpi
public interface AdvertService
extends Monitorable

Author:
rob The GATAdvertService allows GATAdvertisable instances to get published to and queried in an advert directory. Such an advert directory is a meta data directory with an hierarchical namespace attached.

Method Summary
 void add(Advertisable advert, MetaData metaData, java.lang.String path)
          Add an Advertizable instance and related meta data to the GATAdvertService, at path (absolute or relative to PWD).
 void delete(java.lang.String path)
          Remove an Advertizable instance and related meta data from the GATAdvertService, at path (absolute or relative to PWD).
 java.lang.String[] find(MetaData metaData)
          Query the GATAdvertService for entries matching the specified set of meta data.
 MetaData getMetaData(java.lang.String path)
           
 java.lang.String getPWD()
          Returns the current element of the GATAdvertService namespace used as reference for relative paths.
 void setPWD(java.lang.String path)
          Specify the element of the GATAdvertService namespace to be used as reference for relative paths.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.gridlab.gat.monitoring.Monitorable
addMetricListener, getMetrics, removeMetricListener
 

Method Detail

add

public void add(Advertisable advert,
                MetaData metaData,
                java.lang.String path)
         throws GATInvocationException
Add an Advertizable instance and related meta data to the GATAdvertService, at path (absolute or relative to PWD). If an GATAdvertService entry exists at the specified path, that entry gets overwritten, and a warning is issued.

Parameters:
metaData - Meta data to be associated with the passed GATAdvertiseable.
path - Path (either absolute or relative to PWD) of the new entry.
GATInvocationException

delete

public void delete(java.lang.String path)
            throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
                   GATInvocationException
Remove an Advertizable instance and related meta data from the GATAdvertService, at path (absolute or relative to PWD). If

Parameters:
path - Path (either absolute or relative to PWD) of the entry to be deleted.
Throws:
java.util.NoSuchElementException - The path is incorrect.
GATInvocationException

getMetaData

public MetaData getMetaData(java.lang.String path)
                     throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
                            GATInvocationException
Parameters:
path - Path (either absolute or relative to PWD) of the entry.
Returns:
A MetaData containing the metadata.
Throws:
java.util.NoSuchElementException - The path is incorrect.
GATInvocationException

find

public java.lang.String[] find(MetaData metaData)
                        throws GATInvocationException
Query the GATAdvertService for entries matching the specified set of meta data. The returned paths can be destroyed at any time.

Parameters:
metaData - Meta data describing the entries to be searched for.
Returns:
Paths, each pointing to a matching entry. If no mathces are found, null is returned.
GATInvocationException

setPWD

public void setPWD(java.lang.String path)
            throws GATInvocationException
Specify the element of the GATAdvertService namespace to be used as reference for relative paths.

Parameters:
path - New absolute or relative reference path.
GATInvocationException

getPWD

public java.lang.String getPWD()
                        throws GATInvocationException
Returns the current element of the GATAdvertService namespace used as reference for relative paths.

Returns:
Absolute reference path.
GATInvocationException
